column7: pcie core offset=2, 8 =power budget included,01-F0 enabled
bit 4 =enable ASPM L1, bit 3 = advertise ASPM L0s
7:0= 0x00 = port num, other bits = 0x00 - All ClkReqDisables= 0x0
20:13 = 0010 1011; 7:0 = C4; data scale = 0.01x; @3.3 volt;idle mode D3 power = 1.96 W
46 = DSN Pointer; FF - rolebased error , retry pos, Adv fatal/nonfatal errs enabled,
0x100 - 0x20 = clkReqExtCnt = 20*50 ns=1.6us; 2=L1 pll down ext cnt = 2 * 1us = 2us.
Reduce the electrical idle detection delay and mask off the EIOS errors at L0's transitions
bit 2:0 = PME source = 0x0, bit 3 - BAR0 io = 0; Other bits = D1, D2, D3 power = 0
FEM and high gain PA; Support Afterburner; Implement BT Coex
Min power index to avoid FEM damage; WLAN/BT Share Antenna
LED : Radio enabled, WLAN LED active low
LED duty cycle (used to be gpiotimerval)
Upper 2 nibbles contain temperature threshold for single chain mode and lower 2 nibbles contain temperature sensor offset
Upper 7 bits in MSB used for measpower (measured power), and Lower 9 bits in LSB are used for rawtempsense
Lower 8 bits in LSB is used for tempsense_slope; upper 6 bits for tempcorrx and bits 8&9 form tempsense_option
Lowest nible (bits 0-3) for freqoffset_corr, bit 4 for iqcal_swp_dis, and bit 5 for hw_iqcal_en
2G Band: Idle Target TSSI / Max Power
5G Band: midband Idle Target TSSI / Max Power
